title: Australian diary. No. 057
creator_credit: Frank S Allan and Australian news and Information Bureau
brief_description: Byram Mansell applies aboriginal legends to art work on murals and silks; Garden Island Naval Dockyards keeps the navy in fighting trim; grape harvest in the Murrumbidgee Irrigation Area; speed-boat carnival on Sydney Harbour aids spastic children.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank S Allan and Australian news and Information Bureau
